titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located in St. Charles, Illinois, as the "John E. Grotberg Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Designates the post office building located on West Main Street in St. Charles, Illinois, as the John E. Grotberg Post Office.
